/usr/bin/clang++ -g -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX11.3.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/GameofLife.dir/main.cpp.o -o GameofLife   -L/opt/homebrew/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib glad/libglad.a -lglfw /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX11.3.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks/OpenGL.framework/OpenGL.tbd
